original_title: John Williams & Berliner Philharmoniker - The Berlin Concert
overview: John Williams has made cinematic history with his film scores and transported entire generations into his musical worlds. He has composed the soundtracks for cinema blockbusters such as "Star Wars", "Jurassic Park", "E.T." and "Harry Potter". In this concert, he conducts some of his most famous film classics. At the same time, this is his debut on the podium of the Berliner Philharmoniker. May the Force be with him ...
title: John Williams & Berliner Philharmonic - The Berlin Concert
